PlaceholderDesc_Npc_HasDailyRoutine_Star: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the npc has daily routine events. Must be closed with Npc_HasDailyRoutine_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Npc_HasDailyRoutine_End: End of the content that will only be rendered if the npc has daily routine events.
PlaceholderDesc_Npc_DailyRoutine_Events: List of daily routine events of the npc. The daily routine event list template will be used for this.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_Events_Star: Start of the list of daily routine events of the npc. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_Events_End. Attributes of the event can be used with the CurEvent_ placeholders.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_Events_End: End of the list of daily routine events of the npc.
PlaceholderDesc_Npc_DailyRoutine_Functio: List of daily routine functions of the npc. The daily routine function list template will be used for this.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_Functions_S: Start of the list of daily routine functions of the npc. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_Functions_End. Attributes of the event can be used with the CurEvent_ placeholders.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_Functions_E: Ende of the list of daily routine functions of the npc.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_Function: A function of the daily routine. The daily routine function template will be used for this.
PlaceholderDesc_CurEvent_Index: Zero based index of the current daily routine event in the daily routine list.
